name: miaoli-materials-management
description: 苗栗社福促進協會物資管理平台

scripts.dev: npm run setup && (python -m http.server 8000 & sleep 1 && open http://localhost:8000)
scripts.dev-arc: npm run setup && open -a Arc http://localhost:8000
scripts.build: npm run setup && echo 'Static site ready for deployment'
scripts.test: npm run setup && echo '🧪 請用 VS Code Live Server 打開 test.html 進行測試'
scripts.reset-env: cp .env.example .env && echo '📋 .env 檔案已重置為範例，請編輯 .env 後執行 npm run setup'

author: T-Cross
